properties.areaDesc: Christian, KY; Hopkins, KY; Caldwell, KY; Lyon, KY; Trigg, KY; Todd, KY
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 6:54AM CST until January 11 at 7:45AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Christian County in south central Kentucky...
Caldwell County in western Kentucky...
Trigg County in western Kentucky...
Hopkins County in northwestern Kentucky...
Northwestern Todd County in south central Kentucky...
Eastern Lyon County in western Kentucky...

* Until 745 AM CST.

* At 654 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Land Between The Lakes Area to 6 miles north of
Paris Landing State Park, moving northeast at 70 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Hopkinsville, Madisonville, Oak Grove, Princeton, Dawson Springs,
Cadiz, Fort Campbell, Land Between The Lakes Area, Earlington,
Nortonville, Pembroke, Mortons Gap, Crofton, Olney, Cobb, Canton,
Rockcastle, White Plains, Hanson and St. Charles.

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 44 and 92.
Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 71 and 120.
Western Kentucky Parkway between Mile Markers 39 and 42.
Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 1 and 34.
properties.instruction:
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread
significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately
likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of
a building. These storms may cause serious injury and significant
property damage.
